# === Logs ===
# AI-irrelevant log files (noisy, large, no code value)
# Generated by ainit.dev

# Generic log files
*.log
logs/
log/

# npm
npm-debug.log*

# Yarn
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# pnpm
pnpm-debug.log*

# Lerna
lerna-debug.log*

# Runtime logs
*.log.*
*.log.gz

# Crash logs
crash.log
crash.*.log
hs_err_pid*

# Access logs
access.log*
error.log*
